9e0ec975-7c38-4f56-9b2a-038586f1a5b1.description: To achieve this level the student has demonstrated they have a knowledge of the origins of coffee as well as the knowledge of the steps involved in making espresso style coffee. They have also completed a Victorian Food Handling Certificate and can now practically produce a 25ml shot of espresso with crema via the clean, fill, brush, tamp, pour procedure.
9e0ec975-7c38-4f56-9b2a-038586f1a5b1.name: Barista - Emerging

badge_template_activities.title: To achieve this level the student has demonstrated they have a knowledge of the origins of coffee as well as the knowledge of the steps involved in making espresso style coffee.

b045505f-6009-4ca7-9e77-bfdf27eadd50.description: In addition to the emerging criteria, the student has demonstrated that they can practically produce a standard Cappuccino with a 25ml shot of espresso, 1/3rd milk, 1/3rd foam in that the coffee shall have a silky white milk foam with a dusting of chocolate. They can also operate as part of a café team to produce beverages for a school event from the School's Marketplace.

b85aff89-fe0f-47d2-b5a8-ef390044dd75.description: To achieve this level students must show knowledge and understanding of the Production activities when planning to make a M.E.S.H film. 5a8b94cc-ec0c-4e2d-b122-49b923583553.description: To achieve this credential the student has demonstrated that they can independently set up a market stall on a school-based market night / or set up an operational online shopping platform for their products. They can also independently employ customer service skills to trade with the general public and complete a financial budget projecting their costs, break even pricing levels, break even quantities, anticipated profit figures. Evaluation of their market day performance is also required.
5a8b94cc-ec0c-4e2d-b122-49b923583553.name: Market Trader - Proficient

22864205-6143-4c58-9475-4f2185a2c928.description: Development of a clear research project that connects and understanding of Australia and World War Two and the way extreme political ideologies have had an impact on conflict, genocide and global migration. The student has also explored a recent example of conflict and the manner in which that has impacted Australia's migration trends. The student has explored the challenges a growing nation faces and proposes solutions that balance positive migration with a sustainable future.
22864205-6143-4c58-9475-4f2185a2c928.name: Our Changing Nation - Developing

badge_template_activities.title: Developing

af2886db-24d0-4b12-b681-bc3e42bd2bc5.description: All class work has been completed to a satisfactory standard, representing a sound knowledge in the global challenges and events that contributed to World War Two, the political ideologies that inspired the Holocaust, the challenges of racism and discrimination in modern society, the waves of migration that brought different people and cultures to Our Place and the modern challenges of migration.
af2886db-24d0-4b12-b681-bc3e42bd2bc5.name: Our Changing Nation - Emerging

badge_template_activities.title: Emerging

c268f471-3697-4355-9a7a-de3a4c021581.description: The student utilises their work in the class project to develop a clear policy for the party to take to election. The written policy makes a clear platform for the party to present a detailed and visual solution that helps them compete for government with a solution for the future. The student has demonstrated a detailed understanding of the way Australia has evolved since WW2 and how migration has created opportunities for Our Place.
c268f471-3697-4355-9a7a-de3a4c021581.name: Our Changing Nation - Proficient

badge_template_activities.title: Proficient

2d761493-d68a-4ab3-b25b-0eb28f7c9fc1.description: Development of a clear research project that connects an understanding of Australia's geographic past and challenges. The student worked in a small team to present a clear understanding of the cause and consequence of geographic events and processes The student was able to explore the nature of the Australian environment prior to European arrival, the impact of Climate Change and challenges this creates for the future. The presentation proposes solutions and a way forward for Our Place.
2d761493-d68a-4ab3-b25b-0eb28f7c9fc1.name: Our Climate Our Future - Developing

badge_template_activities.title: Developing

b5ec5365-ce53-4d9c-8df0-0121571e1c3e.description: All class work has been completed to a satisfactory standard, representing a sound knowledge in the nature of Australia's Biomes and environment, how First Nation's people sustainably interacted with the landscape, the impact of European arrival on the landscape, introduced species and the ongoing challenges of climate change.
b5ec5365-ce53-4d9c-8df0-0121571e1c3e.name: Our Climate Our Future - Emerging

badge_template_activities.title: Emerging

26f07c4c-1cf2-425d-ad4c-2ffe774321d4.name: Our Climate Our Future - Proficient

badge_template_activities.title: Proficient

2137d919-e6cf-4b27-8a2e-1f7a45242803.description: Development of a clear research project that connects and understanding of Australia roles in the world and a strategy for the election campaign. The student has participated in the construction of a multimedia presentation of visual advertising and print materials that propose a solution for creating a positive international image for Australia beyond its own borders. Students may explore strategies for foreign aid, defense and future safety and support the arts to promote Australian culture.
2137d919-e6cf-4b27-8a2e-1f7a45242803.name: Our Place in the World - Developing

0a879f47-7807-420f-8131-2288fee3cf25.description: All class work has been completed to a satisfactory standard, representing a sound knowledge of the way Australia engages with the global community to maintain a positive and cooperative image. 0a879f47-7807-420f-8131-2288fee3cf25.name: Our Place in the World - Emerging

d967f39b-40b0-4a45-b932-02a8408bb9f7.description: Earning a performance skills credential at the emerging level students must show creativity in the acting and direction for performance of their chosen Theatrical Production. Students must rehearse and develop a character for their chosen role to develop and perform in the theatre production. Students must then show their thinking by communicating their journey when acting and directing in their Show and Tell folio.
d967f39b-40b0-4a45-b932-02a8408bb9f7.name: Performance Skills - Emerging

badge_template_activities.title: To earn a performance skills credential at the emerging level students must show creativity in the acting and direction for performance of their chosen Theatrical Production. Students must rehearse and develop a character for their chosen role to develop and perform in the theatre production.

523d3789-0345-413c-b1af-3dcd452b4409.description: To achieve this production design credential at the developing level students must show creativity in the design elements of their chosen Theatrical Production Role from the list- Costume, Make-up/ Hair, Set, Props, Lighting and Sound. Students must experiment to provide innovation for their chosen role, then identify how they might implement that design into the theatre production. Students must then show their thinking by communicating their designs in their Show and Tell folio.
523d3789-0345-413c-b1af-3dcd452b4409.name: Production Design - Developing

badge_template_activities.title: Production Design - Developing. Completion of the activities in the Credential Criteria PowerPoint. Show evidence of your designs in your Show and Tell folio.

8c192406-eac6-44aa-abc9-7180f92f17c5.description: Development of a clear research project that connects an understanding of Australia's First Nations and European contact history with the long term outcomes. The student worked in a small team to present a clear understanding of the cause and consequence of historical events. The student was ablet to explore the impact of European arrival on First Nations people and the nature of John Batman's Treaty, the impact of the Stolen Generation and Australia's involvement in World War One.
8c192406-eac6-44aa-abc9-7180f92f17c5.name: Reconciling Our Past - Developing

badge_template_activities.title: Developing

03e3f513-8505-44b3-895b-582299aa3724.description: All class work has been completed to a satisfactory standard, representing a sound knowledge in William Buckley and the nature of First Nations people within Our Place, European arrival and contrasting views, the impact of European arrival on First Nation's people, the Stolen Generation and the challenges surrounding the Australia Day debate.
03e3f513-8505-44b3-895b-582299aa3724.name: Reconciling Our Past - Emerging

badge_template_activities.title: Emerging

d8dcd694-8134-4194-bfb5-22f3db60b265.description: The student utilises their work in the class project to develop a clear policy for the party to take to election. The written policy makes a clear platform for the party to present a detailed and visual solution that helps them compete for government with a solution for the future. The student has demonstrated an understanding of the relationship between past and present issues with Australia's history, the role of significant indigenous identities, with the view to create an inclusive future.
d8dcd694-8134-4194-bfb5-22f3db60b265.name: Reconciling Our Past - Proficient

badge_template_activities.title: Proficient

f625ac98-cb60-47eb-b71e-7c5f935de32d.description: Students are able to identify strengths and limitations of different forms of communication. Students are able to communicate their own research based opinion on scientific discoveries/ideas/theories
f625ac98-cb60-47eb-b71e-7c5f935de32d.name: Scientific Communication: Developing

badge_template_activities.title: Can critique strengths and weaknesses of a scientific poster. Can critique data sources to develop own opinion. Can utilise feedback from experts to enhance/modify or adjust their own opinions and understanding

be88b9cb-d7af-4c79-b78e-0e8a7693d6fa.description: Students are able to research and then communicate scientific ideas through varying formats, including a poster, verbal discussion and written formats. Students are able to engage with experts to deepen their understanding
be88b9cb-d7af-4c79-b78e-0e8a7693d6fa.name: Scientific Communication: Emerging

badge_template_activities.title: Can create an informative scientific poster. Can correctly reference primary sources. Can discuss with group members using scientific terminology.

f07a1372-9077-466c-948f-4834cca8999a.description: Students are able to select between forms of communication, to increase effectiveness. Students are able to use metacognition to communicate their learning and development of ideas
f07a1372-9077-466c-948f-4834cca8999a.name: Scientific Communication: Proficient

badge_template_activities.title: Can design a highly effective poster and portfolio. Can use annotations, work samples and finished products to show the progress of their learning. Can analyse strengths and weakness in their own knowledge.

30da329c-173c-4ae0-a7a9-412cf5d87954.description: Apply skills from the emerging and developing badges in order to extend the quality of the virtual reality environment and organize animation sets with events.
30da329c-173c-4ae0-a7a9-412cf5d87954.name: Virtual Reality - Proficient

badge_template_activities.title: Proficient
